summary: In 1916, the 1st Australian Tunnelling Company is tunneling beneath German fortifications and bunkers to detonate massive explosive charges.
cast: Brendan Cowell|Alan Dukes|Alex Thompson|Harrison Gilbertson|Duncan Young|Steve Le Marquand|Gyton Grantley|Warwick Young|Mark Coles Smith|Martin Thomas|Oliver Leimbach|Anthony Hayes|Leon Ford|Fletcher Illidge|Morgan Illidge|Jacqueline McKenzie|Juliana Dodd|Gerald Lepkowski|Bella Heathcote|Chris Haywood|Bob Franklin|Anthony Ring|Nikki Fort|Alice Cavanagh|Mahala Wallace|Jessica Robertson|Marcus Costello|Kenneth Spiteri|Aden Young|David Ritchie|Thom Green|John Stanton|Andy Bramble|David Brooke-Taylor|Kristopher Bos|Dennis Kreusler|Tim Sawatzki|Tracey Rose Sparke|Matthew Wollaston|Samuel R. Wright
director: Director: Jeremy Sims (as Jeremy Hartley Sims)
title: Beneath Hill 60
